name: Bad record MAC
descr: Possibly a bad SSL implementation, or payload has been tampered with e.g. FTP firewall rule on FTPS server.

name: Unsupported certificate
descr: e.g. certificate has only Server authentication usage enabled and is presented as a client certificate

name: Certificate expired
descr: Check server certificate expire also check no certificate in the chain presented has expired

name: Access denied
descr: TLS only â€“ e.g. no client certificate has been presented (TLS: Blank certificate message or SSLv3: No Certificate alert), but server is configured to require one.

name: Unrecognized name
column6: client's Server Name Indicator specified a hostname not supported by the server

name: No Application Protocol
descr: TLS only, client's ALPN did not contain any server-supported protocols
